name: Self Portrait 0
description:
Once upon a time there was lovable bear who went out into the world to seek the love.

He was found by caring dad, who bought the bear and gave them to the clumsy child. 

Whilst out for a walk by a reservoir, the clumsy child dropped his bear. The child cried but the caring dad could not get the bear out of the water. They left them there. 

The bear shivered with cold, from the water and from the distance from the love they deserved. 

The cruel water tore at and deformed the bear’s face. The spirit of Cthulhu found the bear and saw a mind it could easily conquer. The bears face grew long Cthulhu tentacles.

The reservoir was drained and rubbish collectors found the deranged bear and treated them as trash. Trash receives no love and the bear sensed cruelty. 

The bear was placed by a trashcan on a public walkway. The public walked past but offered no love. 

Cthulhu showed the bear how to invade the human’s electronic devices.

The bear entered the images and photographs belonging to the humans. The bear would seek out what they deserve. The is seeking and will find you.

Cthulhu the Bear wants love.
